polyfill_notFound.description: Logging message. %s should always be a noun.

gitProcessor_noListen.message: Attempted to listen while already listening.

gitProcessor_alert.description: Logging message, used in Git update process.

gitProcessor_commit.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_commits.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_force.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_pushedTo.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_new.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_tag.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_branch.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_by.description: User-facing string, used in Git change messages.

gitProcessor_updateToBranch.description: Logging message. Note the space at the end, which is necessary.

gitProcessor_npmInstall.description: Logging message. 'npm install' is a command, and therefore, should probably be left as-is.

gitProcessor_updating.description: This message is used as the disconnect message in IRC. This message can be stylized with emoticons.

caughtException.description: Logging message. Used when an exception has been caught.

none.description: Logging message. Used when an exception has been caught.

alert_name.description: The name of the alert command.

alert_help.message: Adds/Removes channels the bot will alert when updates occur. This command will reply with all alerted channels when not supplied with any parameters.
alert_help.description: Help string for the alert command.

alert_usage.description: Usage string for the alert command. The only word that needs changing is 'channel'.

alert_current.description: User-facing string that is used in the alert command. Note the required space at the end.

alert_changes.description: User-facing string that is used in the alert command. Note the required space at the end.
